scripts.migrate: docker-compose run --rm asl-schema sh -c 'npm run migrate' && docker-compose run --rm asl-workflow npm run migrate
scripts.seed: docker-compose run --rm asl-schema sh -c 'npm run seed' && docker-compose run --rm asl-workflow npm run seed
scripts.build-search-index: docker-compose run --rm asl-internal-search sh -c 'npm run indexer -- --reset'
